p: Another group led by Y.‐Z. Zhang from the zoonosis group of the Chinese CDC in Beijing determined the genome of a closely related coronavirus by deep meta‐transcriptomic sequencing of the bronchoalveolar fluid of a patient working at the seafood market of Wuhan (Wu et al., 2020c). Analysis of the cell receptor interacting viral S (spike) gene showed indications of a recombination event. Protein modelling suggested the human angiotensin‐converting enzyme II (ACE2) protein as receptor.
